what: Access the microbiome compendium from R
title: Access the microbiome compendium from R
text: dataset includes 170,000 samples publicly available 16S rRNA amplicon sequencing data, processed using pipeline reference database. See full documentation.

title: Access the microbiome compendium from R
text: smoothest installation experience, use BiocManager Bioconductor package.

title: Access the microbiome compendium from R
text: Load compendium using: resulting object TreeSummarizedExperiment object. Currently, “tree” part TreeSummarizedExperiment populated, roadmap.

title: load data — get_compendium
text: bfc BiocFileCache object use ... passed data.table::fread

title: load data — get_compendium
code: cpd <- get_compendium() #> adding rname 'https://zenodo.org/record/8186994/files/taxonomic_table.csv.gz' #> Error in data.table::fread(path, ...): To read gz and bz2 files directly, fread() requires 'R.utils' package which cannot be found. Please install 'R.utils' using 'install.packages('R.utils')'.  dim(cpd) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'cpd' not found cpd #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'cpd' not found assayNames(cpd) #> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'assayNames': object 'cpd' not found
